addMapping(Integer, Class<? extends Tile>) - Method in class de.samdev.absgdx.framework.util.tiled.TmxMapLoader
Adds a mapping between a GID and a Tile Class The class must - be a subclass of "Tile" - and have an empty constructor (0 parameters) - and/or have an 1-parameter constructor for the properties ( 1 parameter = Hashmap ) if the class has an constructor with the properties-map this one is used, otherwise the empty constructor is used

C

canCollideWith(CollisionGeometryOwner) - Method in interface de.samdev.absgdx.framework.entities.colliosiondetection.CollisionGeometryOwner
Get if this object can collide with an other return FALSE: This Entity has no collisions - not even collision notices return TRUE : This Entity can either hard or soft collide - depending on canMoveCollide() [!] ATTENTION PLS: The results of this function should be commutative ( a.canCollideWith(b) == b.canCollideWith(a) ).

getCircleLineXDistance(float, float, float, float, float, float, float) - Static method in class de.samdev.absgdx.framework.math.ShapeMath
Get the X-distance the Circle can maximally move before it collides with the line-segment (at this distance they don't intersect but touch) (be aware that this is a different value than the get X/Y TouchDistance methods, this is the "maximal move distance", not the "minimal distance") [!] The distance gets CollisionGeometry.FDELTA added so the no-intersection ruled is enforced If they will never touch Float.NaN is returned
getCircleLineYDistance(float, float, float, float, float, float, float) - Static method in class de.samdev.absgdx.framework.math.ShapeMath
Get the Y-distance the Circle can maximally move before it collides with the line-segment (at this distance they don't intersect but touch) [!] The distance gets CollisionGeometry.FDELTA added so the no-intersection ruled is enforced If they will never touch Float.NaN is returned
